tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"保护","italic": false,"color":"white"}',Lore:['{"text":"冷却与储存在经验条中显示。","color":"gray","italic": false}','[{"text":"手持该药水时，","italic": false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"范围内的","italic": false,"color":"gray"},{"text":"所有人","italic": false,"color":"gray","underlined": true},{"text":"头顶出现白色粒子。","italic": false,"color":"gray"}]','{"text":"牧师不会被缓慢效果影响。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"italic": false,"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.use","color":"white"},{"text":"] / [","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.swapOffhand","color":"white"},{"text":"]","color":"white"},{"text":"自己饮用时：","color":"gray","italic": false}]','[{"text":"ᛥ 药效  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"抗性提升 II","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"⌛ 持续时长  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"5 秒 / 2 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','""','[{"italic": false,"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.swapOffhand","color":"white"},{"text":"]","color":"white"},{"text":"作用于自己外 10 格内的非牧师","italic": false,"color":"gray"},{"text":"所有人","italic": false,"color":"gray","underlined": true},{"text":"时：","italic": false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"ᛥ 药效  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"抗性提升 II & 缓慢 III","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"⌛ 持续时长  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"7 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','""','[{"text":"⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"1 瓶","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"15 秒 (白昼)","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":" / 25 秒 (夜晚)","italic": false,"color":"dark_gray"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
